official_title: To exempt section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 from termination.

summary.text: Amends the Defense Production Act of 1950 to exempt from termination a provision of such Act which authorizes the President to review and prohibit certain mergers, acquisitions, and takeovers that the President determines would threaten or impair national security.

titles.title: To exempt section 721 of the Defense Production Act of 1950 from termination.
